title: Motorcycle tire

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for the motorcycle tire, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a front view of a motorcycle tire of our new design;
FIG. 2 is a front view thereof, the rear, top, and bottom views being identical thereto; and,
FIG. 3 is a right-side view of our new design, the left-side view being identical thereto.
